actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to permit certain suits against the United States with respect to tort claims arising out of assault, battery, false imprisonment, and false arrest.

summary.text: Permits suits against the United States with respect to tort claims arising out of assault, battery, false imprisonment, and false arrest. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 2680(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to permit certain suits against the United States with respect to tort claims arising out of assault, battery, false imprisonment, and false arrest.
